title: Update dropdown styling with white text and Royal Teal background

requirements.text: Update all dropdown/select components across the application to display option text in white color when the dropdown menu is open

quotes: when i click dropdown, option for selection should be properly display with white color font

acceptanceCriteria: All dropdown option text displays in white color (#FFFFFF or equivalent)
Text color applies to options in open dropdown state
White text remains readable against Royal Teal background

requirements.text: Update all dropdown/select components across the application to display Royal Teal background color for the entire dropdown menu when opened

quotes: whole dropdown should be Royal Teal

acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown menu background displays in Royal Teal color when opened
Background color applies to entire dropdown panel including all options
Royal Teal background matches the existing platform color scheme

requirements.text: Update global CSS in frontend/index.css to define dropdown styling rules that set white text color and Royal Teal background for all select/dropdown option elements
acceptanceCriteria: CSS rules target dropdown option elements across all form components
Styling applies consistently to dropdowns in Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing, and Admin Dashboard pages
Hover and focus states maintain white text visibility

requirements.text: Update Tailwind configuration in frontend/tailwind.config.js to ensure Royal Teal color is available for dropdown styling and matches existing color tokens
acceptanceCriteria: Royal Teal color token is defined in Tailwind theme
Color value matches existing Royal Teal usage in the platform
Dropdown components can reference the color token consistently

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain existing dropdown functionality and user interactions
Ensure dropdown styling changes do not affect other UI components
nonGoals: Changing dropdown options content or values
Modifying dropdown positioning or layout structure
Updating backend data structures or logic
